subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Olympic Games (2008)
lead_paragraph: Amber Neben, who will compete Sunday in the women’s road cycling race, has coped with stress fractures in her legs, the switch of sports and cancer on her way to Beijing.
snippet: Amber Neben, who will compete Sunday in the women’s road cycling race, has coped with stress fractures in her legs, the switch of sports and cancer on her way to Beijing.
